tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE composers (
    composer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    composer_name VARCHAR(255),
    birth_year INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    major_works VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE works (
  work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  work_name STRING,
  composer_id INT,
  year_composed INT,
  genre STRING
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  work_id INT,
  conductor_id INT,
  venue STRING,
  performance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE composers (
    composer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    composer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    birth_date DATE,
    death_date DATE,
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE works (
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    work_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    composed_date DATE,
    composer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES composers(composer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE work_genres (
    work_id INT,
    genre_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (work_id, genre_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (work_id) REFERENCES works(work_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(genre_id)
);
